summary: Conmunicus, a consumer opinion fim, is conducting a survey. The survey asks people to answer questions about their smoking habits. It also asks them to rate the quality of the newspapers they read. For confidential support on suicide matters call the Samaritans on 08457 909090 or click here for details.
